title: Act of Aggression - Reboot Edition

notes: It works full screen with high preset settings! But ... the problem is to start the game. At start we only have a black screen with the green cursor; when you see "Access Steam Community ... shift tab" message, press 2x ESC button, and you land to the splash screen, then the menu ... with a bright green background! But, you're able to access all menus and start the game. Vanilla version tested successfully (Reboot Edition crashes all the time); no login done, played offline on skirmish mode.
title: Act of Aggression - Reboot Edition
